channel.title: Howitworks on Eden Health
channel.description: Recent content in Howitworks on Eden Health

item.title: Employees
item.description:
Healthcare like you’ve never experienced it before.

As an Eden Health member, you have a team of doctors and nurses at your side. You can see us both in-person and virtually, at no cost and as often as you’d like.

With Eden Health, you also have unlimited access to our virtual health concierge, who will help answer, track down, and coordinate anything related to your health.

Modern, personal healthcare

Eden Health members enjoy unlimited visits at our beautiful offices - with no out of pocket costs.

We provide the full range of primary care services:

Preventative and chronic care
Acute care and minor injuries
Behavioral health
Allergies and allergic reactions
Annual physicals
Women's health
Skin conditions
Labs and screenings

Virtual healthcare concierge

Some examples of requests we can handle:

  • "Can I see the doctor today between 2pm and 5pm?”
  • “Do I have the flu or just a cold?”
  • “My physical therapy isn’t working. Do I need surgery?”
  • “My ortho said I need to get an MRI. Where should I go?”
  • “I forgot when my last tetanus shot was. Can you track it down?”
  • “Can you send my medical records to my endocrinologist?”
  • “Should I be worried about this rash?”
  • “Who’s the best physical therapist in Brooklyn?”
  • “Where should my wife go for an OB/GYN visit?”
  • “I’ve had a cough since I starting taking the meds. Is that normal?"

item.title: Employers
item.description:
We make healthcare work for businesses.

Eden Health’s comprehensive approach meaningfully improves health outcomes for employees and reduces the total cost of care to employers.

For common conditions, our doctors and nurses treat patients both in-person and virtually. For more complex conditions requiring a specialist’s expertise, we refer to high-value providers who have a proven track record for high quality and high value.

Save on healthcare costs

Eden Health removes financial and logistical barriers to receiving care. By improving access and convenience for employees, we make it easy for employees to receive the right care at the right time at the right place.

▾Reduce specialist overuse

▾Reduce time spent seeking and coordinating care

▾Reduce urgent care and ER use

▾Reduce waste from market pricing failures

▾Reduce wellness-sensitive medical events

▾Reduce use of expensive brand name medications

Population Health Management

Surface prevalent conditions within the employee base. We also work with employers to implement high-impact programming that targets the specific issues that your employees are facing.

Curated, value-based referrals

We use industry-leading pricing and quality data to curate our referrals to providers that have a proven track record of high quality. These value-based referrals drive significant cost savings and improve patient satisfaction.
